div.p: Insurance agencies have a very large amount of customerâ€™s sensitive information and documentation. Also face numerous challenges in managing their operations, including handling large volumes of data, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements, and providing seamless customer service. With the standard method to handle these operations and handling data causes lots of human errors and delay in the executions. To avoid these kinds of errors and delays we build a module for odoo erp to manage your policies and insurances.

header.h2: Key Features of Insurance Management Software

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Here you have a dynamic dashboard where you get the all important information about the policies like renewal, claims details, also some informative graphs. It will helps to analyze your insurance business.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: The addon allows insurance companies to manage all aspects of policy administration, including policy issuance, renewal, and cancellation. It provides a centralized platform for storing policy data, including policy details, premiums, and coverage periods.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Here you get a robust claim management system that enables insurance companies to manage claims efficiently. It provides features such as claim tracking, claim status updates, claim processing.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: In this addons you get the features to print reports and send the reports to the customerâ€™s mails directly. Also you can share reports with your agents for claims and other detailed reports.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: One of the most important features of an insurance agency is to give commission to your agents. Here you have a feature to manage your agentâ€™s commissions along with his works and his customers.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: One of the basic features which is strongly recommended in every insurance agency is Reminders. Here you can set the reminders for renewal dates in every policy and installment payment reminders, policy expiration reminders.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: Here you can manage your agents details like personal information, his work information, his customer and policies. In this addons you got an agent master where you can manage your agents with his full details.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6 sh_main_box

div.p: CRM module is the cherry on the cake in this addons, that allows insurance companies to manage customer meetings, track customer relationships, and analyze customer behavior. Also there are tools for analyzing your customer needs and help to never miss updates that always reminds you of your task.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-6 col-md-6 sh_main_work_box sh_mb_1
col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-6 col-md-6 sh_main_work_box sh_mb_2
